Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable(System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableState.Never)
System.Obsolete("This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.", true)

summary.span: 从任意源接收多播流量的客户端接收器，亦称为任意源多播 (ASM) 或 Internet 标准多播 (ISM)。

span.span: A client receiver for multicast traffic from any source, also known as Any Source Multicast (ASM) or Internet Standard Multicast (ISM).

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable(System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableState.Never)
System.Obsolete("This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.", true)

param.name: groupAddress
param.span: 此接收器要订阅的多播组地址。

span.span: The multicast group address for this receiver to subscribe to.

param.name: localPort
param.span: 此接收器要绑定到的本地端口。

span.span: The local port for this receiver to bind to.

summary.span: 创建一个可以订阅组地址并从任意源接收数据报的新 UDP 客户端。

span.span: Creates a new UDP client that can subscribe to a group address and receive datagrams from any source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数将 UDP 多播套接字的组地址和端口，与相关联，但不会绑定或以其他方式使用套接字。The constructor associates a UDP multicast socket with a group address and port, but does not bind or otherwise use the socket. `groupAddress`参数可能是 IPv6 或 IPv4 多播地址。The `groupAddress` parameter may be either an IPv6 or IPv4 multicast address. `localPort`参数必须指定一个端口小于 1024。The `localPort` parameter must not specify a port less than 1,024.

span.span: is .
reference
is less than 0 -or- is greater than 65,535.

public: IAsyncResult ^ BeginJoinGroup(AsyncCallback ^ callback, System::Object ^ state);

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable(System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableState.Never)
System.Obsolete("This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.", true)

param.name: callback
param.span: 要在此操作完成时调用的回调方法。

span.span: A callback method to invoke when the operation completes.

param.name: state
param.span: 要传递给此操作的 callback 方法的可选状态信息。

span.span: Optional state information to pass to the callback method for this operation.

summary.span: 绑定套接字并开始执行多播组的联接操作，以便允许接收来自任何组参与者的数据报。

span.span: Binds the socket and begins a join operation to the multicast group to allow datagrams to be received from any group participant.
Returns .
An that references this operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将 UDP 多播套接字绑定到的本地端口和联接多播的组以允许从任何多播的组参与者收到的数据报。The method binds a UDP multicast socket to a local port and joins a multicast group to allow datagrams to be received from any multicast group participant. 中指定的本地端口和多播的组地址构造函数。The local port and multicast group address are specified in the constructor. 中指定的方法`callback`要加入多播的组的操作已完成时调用参数。The method specified in the `callback` parameter is invoked when the operation to join the multicast group has completed. 如果所需的运行时，方法还会执行策略检查以验证客户端是否允许访问多播的组。If required by the runtime, the method also performs a policy check to verify that the client is allowed to access the multicast group. 如果客户端不允许访问，引发与。If the client is not allowed access, a is thrown with .

exception.span: 已经联接多播组，或联接操作正在进行。

span.span: The multicast group has already been joined or a join operation is currently in progress.
The has been disposed.

exception.span: 尝试访问套接字时出错。

span.span: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.

summary.span: 开始执行从已联接的多播组接收数据包的操作，并在来自任何发送方的数据包到达组时调用指定的回调。

span.span: Begins the operation of receiving a packet from the joined multicast group and invokes the specified callback when a packet has arrived on the group from any sender.
Returns .
An that references this operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法开始从来自任何发件人已联接的多播组接收 UDP 数据包的操作。The method begins an operation of receiving a UDP packet from the joined multicast group from any sender. 中指定的本地端口和多播的组地址构造函数。The local port and multicast group address are specified in the constructor. 多播客户端必须具有已完成加入多播组。The multicast client must also have completed a join to the multicast group. 中指定的方法`callback`收到数据包时，将调用参数。The method specified in the `callback` parameter is invoked when a packet has received. 它可具有套接字失败，如果接收操作失败同步，虽然这是使用 UDP 不常见。It is possible to have a socket failure if a receive operation fails synchronously, although this is uncommon with UDP. 如果发生套接字失败，引发。If a socket failure occurs, a is thrown. 收到的错误指定的成员为枚举。The error received is specified as a member of the enumeration.

summary.span: 开始执行向指定目标发送单播数据包的操作。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法开始将 UDP 数据包发送到已联接的多播组的操作。The method begins an operation of sending a UDP packet to the joined multicast group. 客户端必须已完成加入多播组。The client must have completed a join to the multicast group. 中指定的目标地址`remoteEndPoint`参数必须具有已发送多播的数据包给此接收器。The destination address specified in the `remoteEndPoint` parameter must have already sent a multicast packet to this receiver. 某些协议使用此信息来传递流控制，质量的服务统计信息或恢复消息。Some protocols use this information to pass along flow control, quality of service statistics, or recovery messages. 中指定的方法`callback`收到数据包时，将调用参数。The method specified in the `callback` parameter is invoked when a packet has received. 如果在指定的地址仅允许传输`remoteEndPoint`参数已具有多路广播的数据包发送到此接收方。The transmission is only allowed if the address specified in the `remoteEndPoint` parameter has already sent a multicast packet to this receiver. 如果客户端不允许访问，引发与。If the client is not allowed access, a is thrown with . 如果在指定目标端口`remoteEndPoint`参数为小于 1024，引发与。If the destination port specified in the `remoteEndPoint` parameter is less than 1,024, a is thrown with . 它可具有套接字失败，如果接收操作失败同步，虽然这是使用 UDP 不常见。It is possible to have a socket failure if a receive operation fails synchronously, although this is uncommon with UDP. 如果发生套接字失败，引发。If a socket failure occurs, a is thrown. 收到的错误指定的成员为枚举。The error received is specified as a member of the enumeration.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable(System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableState.Never)
System.Obsolete("This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.", true)

param.name: sourceAddress
param.span: 要阻止的源地址。

span.span: The address of the source to block.

summary.span: 阻止源，从而不再接收源自它的多播数据包。

span.span: Blocks a source so that multicast packets originating from it are no longer received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将一直阻塞源自接收指定的源地址的多路广播的数据包。The method blocks multicast packets originating from a specified source address from being received. 客户端必须已完成加入多播组。The client must have completed a join to the multicast group. `sourceAddress`参数可能是 IPv6 或 IPv4 地址，但`sourceAddress`参数必须与匹配的客户端加入多播组地址族。The `sourceAddress` parameter may be either an IPv6 or IPv4 address, but the `sourceAddress` parameter must match the address family of the multicast group that the client joined. 中指定的方法`callback`收到数据包时，将调用参数。The method specified in the `callback` parameter is invoked when a packet has received. 如果在执行块源操作时出现套接字失败引发。If there is a socket failure while performing the block source operation, a is thrown. 收到的错误指定的成员为枚举。The error received is specified as a member of the enumeration.

span.span: The multicast group has not yet been joined.
The has been disposed.

exception.span: 尝试访问套接字时出错。

span.span: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.

System.Obsolete("This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.", true)

summary.span: 离开多播组并释放 类和基础 的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

span.span: Leaves the multicast group and releases all resources used by the current instance of the class and the underlying the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . Dispose 方法离开中不可用状态。The Dispose method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，占用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法完成异步绑定到套接字和联接的多播组的操作。The method completes an asynchronous bind to a socket and join operation to a multicast group. 如果所需的运行时，方法还会执行策略检查以验证客户端是否允许访问多播的组。If required by the runtime, the method also performs a policy check to verify that the client is allowed to access the multicast group. 如果客户端不允许访问，引发与。If the client is not allowed access, a is thrown with . 如果执行联接组操作，时套接字失败引发。If there is a socket failure while performing the join group operation, a is thrown. 收到的错误指定的成员为枚举。The error received is specified as a member of the enumeration.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定传出的多路广播数据包是否传递到发送应用程序。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether outgoing multicast packets are delivered to the sending application.
Returns .

value.span: 一个值，该值指示向多路广播组发送的传出数据包是否传递到发送应用程序。

span.span: A value that indicates if outgoing packets to a multicast group are delivered to the sending application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多播的流量是在 Internet 上的多对多通信的可扩展方法。Multicast traffic is a scalable method for many-to-many communication on the Internet. 进程订阅的多播的组地址。A process subscribes to a multicast group address. 然后，任何数据包订阅进程发送到多播组接收订阅的多播地址的每个其他进程。Then, any packets sent by a subscribed process to the multicast group are received by every other process subscribed to the multicast address. 此客户端发送到多播组的属性控制是否任何处理在本地计算机上接收多播的数据包数。The property controls whether any process on the local computer receives multicast packets sent by this client to the multicast group.

span.span: The multicast group has not yet been joined.
The has been disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: public int ReceiveBufferSize { get; set; }
.property instance int32 ReceiveBufferSize
Public Property ReceiveBufferSize As Integer
public: property int ReceiveBufferSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable(System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableState.Never)
System.Obsolete("This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.", true)

summary.span: 获取或设置 的接收缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位），该缓冲区用于此 实例上的多播接收操作。

span.span: Gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the receive buffer of the used for multicast receive operations on this instance.
Returns .

value.span: 接收缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The size, in bytes, of the receive buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取或设置大小，以字节为单位的接收缓冲区的基础用于对此的多播的接收操作实例。The property gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the receive buffer of the underlying used for multicast receive operations on this instance. 具体而言，属性控制当数据包到达，但尚未调用应用程序时，堆栈所使用的缓冲区的大小方法。Specifically, the property controls the size of the buffer used by the stack when a packet arrives, but the application has not yet called the method. 如果此缓冲区被填满和应用程序调用之前不断涌现数据包和方法，旧的数据包将被丢弃。If this buffer gets filled up and packets keep coming before the application calls the and methods, old packets will get dropped. 应用程序永远无法接收旧的数据包，并在它调用时将收到较新的数据包方法。The application will never be able to receive the old packets, and will instead receive newer packets when it calls the method. 在 Windows 上的接收缓冲区的默认大小为 8192 字节。The default size of the receive buffer on Windows is 8,192 bytes.

exception.span: 指定的缓冲区大小小于 0。

span.span: The buffer size specified is less than 0.
The multicast group has not yet been joined.
The has been disposed.

summary.span: 获取或设置 的发送缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位），该缓冲区用于此 实例上的多播发送操作。

span.span: Gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the send buffer of the used for multicast send operations on this instance.
Returns .

value.span: 发送缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The size, in bytes, of the send buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取或设置大小，以字节为单位，用于对此的多播的发送操作的基础套接字的发送缓冲区实例。The property gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the send buffer of the underlying Socket used for multicast send operations on this instance. 调用或方法需要较长时间调用根据的值的回调属性，如果发送缓冲区已满。calls to the or methods will take longer to call the callback depending on the value of the property if the send buffer is full. 属性仅控制是否用户的缓冲区保持在物理内存中锁定，直到发送完成。The property only controls whether the user's buffer stays locked in physical memory until the send completes. 在 Windows 上的发送缓冲区的默认大小为 8192 字节。The default size of the send buffer on Windows is 8,192 bytes.

exception.span: 指定的缓冲区大小小于 0。

span.span: The buffer size specified is less than 0.
The multicast group has not yet been joined.
The has been disposed.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable(System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableState.Never)
System.Obsolete("This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.", true)

param.name: sourceAddress
param.span: 要取消阻止的源的地址。

span.span: The address of the source to unblock.

summary.span: 取消阻止以前通过调用 方法阻止的源，以便可以接收来自该源的多播数据包。

span.span: Unblocks a source that was previously blocked by a call to the method so that multicast packets originating from it can be received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可取消以便它们都可以接收来自指定的源地址的多路广播的数据包。The method unblocks multicast packets originating from a specified source address so they can be received. 指定的源地址必须具有已阻止以前通过调用方法。The specified source address must have previously been blocked by a call to the method. 客户端必须已完成加入多播组。The client must have completed a join to the multicast group. `sourceAddress`参数可能是 IPv6 或 IPv4 多播地址。The `sourceAddress` parameter may be either an IPv6 or IPv4 multicast address. 如果中指定的源地址`sourceAddress`参数不阻止以前通过调用方法，引发与。If the specified source address in the `sourceAddress` parameter was not previously blocked by a call to the method, a is thrown with . 如果解除阻止源操作，在执行时出现套接字失败引发。If there is a socket failure while performing the unblock source operation, a is thrown. 收到的错误指定的成员为枚举。The error received is specified as a member of the enumeration.

span.span: The multicast group has not yet been joined.
The has been disposed.

exception.span: 尝试访问套接字时出错。

span.span: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
